attributes.action: To stop Steve McClaren from commenting on the BBC for Euro 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As England Coach, Steve McClaren has failed to take England to this summer’s European cup finals; He has cost the UK millions in lost revenue and also hi jacked over 19 million of the English FA’s money. Therefore i do not believe he is qualified in commentating on any football matches for the BBC whilst taking our TV licence fee money - a job he clearly cannot do!
I don’t believe we should pay our licence fee money to a man who has ruined our summer

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
